column6:
As the Human Torch and Lyja discuss the merits of leaving the F5 to form their own team and Sharon Ventura returns to confront her ex-husband the Thing, the real Doctor Doom returns with cosmic-like power and a thirst for revenge on Reed Richards and the Sub-Mariner! Also starring the Invisible Woman, Psi-Lord and Kristoff--and cameos galore!,2007,7

32 PGS. /Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Clayton Henry | inker:Scott Koblish | penciller:Ron Lim | letterer:Dave Sharpe | colorist:Avalon Studio
